casebody.data:
APPEALS ALLOWED FOR REVIEW

01-2155. Bergstrom v. State Farm Fire & Cas. Co.

Cuyahoga App. No. 79775. Appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 01-1474 and 01-1867, Hillyer v. State Farm Fire & Cas. Co., Cuyahoga App. No. 79176; briefing schedule stayed.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents.
